DOC.brief_summary: To investigate Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) transdermally deliver Rotigotine Japanese Caucasian Female Male Healthy Subjects .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , Safety , Tolerability Single-Dose Transdermal Rotigotine Japanese Caucasian Healthy Male / Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subject healthy accord assessment do eligibility assessment ( medical history , physical examination , blood pressure , heart rate , Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis ) Subject normal bodyweight determine body mass index range 18 28 kg / m² Subject Japanese Caucasian . Japanese subject bear Japan leave Japan 10 year ago . Both parent Japanese subject 100 % Japanese Subjects ( female ) without medically adequate contraception ( e.g . mechanical contraception ( IntrauterineDevice IUD ) , sterilization , hysterectomy ) lactation pregnant woman . Subjects oral contraception hormone replacement within 4 week prior eligibility assessment Subject history chronic alcohol drug abuse Subject consumption 20 g alcohol / day ( amount correspond 0.5 l beer / day 0.25 l wine / day 3 glass ( à 2 cl ) liquor / day Subject clinically relevant allergy Subject know suspected drug hypersensitivity particular , component trial medication Subject clinically significant abnormality physical examination Subject heart rate rest le 50 beat per minute ( bpm ) 100 bpm Subject systolic blood pressure low 100 mmHg high 145 mmHg diastolic blood pressure high 95 mmHg low 60 mmHg Subject atopic eczematous dermatitis / active skin disease skin tumor Subject history significant skin hypersensitivity adhesives transdermal product recent unresolved contact dermatitis
